import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from "react"; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { Context } from "components/context"; import './order.css' const Order = (props) =>{ const [link, setLink] = useState(); const [count, setCount] = useState(100); const [ordersum, setOrdersum]= useState(props.price); const [next, setNext] = useState(true); const {basket} = useContext(Context); const baskett = (name, sum) => { basket(name, sum); if(localStorage.getItem('link').length > 4){ alert('Заполните поле Ссылка') } } useEffect(()=>{ setOrdersum(props.price) },[props.price]); const initCount = (e) => { setCount(e.target.value); let price = props.price; price = sumPrice(price, e.target.value); setOrdersum(price); } const initLink = (e) => { setLink(e.target.value) localStorage.setItem('link', e.target.value) } const sumPrice = (pr, count) =>{ let sum = (pr * count)/ 100; return( sum ) } return( <>

Заказ:

{props.name}
{props.price} $ | 100
initLink(e)} placeholder="Ссылка" className="icon" type="text" size="50" />
initCount(e)} aria-label="Default select example">

Стоимость: {ordersum} $

Поля обязательные для заполнения




Скорость выполнения

{props.start}

Скорость старта

{props.finish}

Гарантия

{props.guarantee}




) } export default Order;
